HomePage.title: Where code meets art.
HomePage.subtitle: Immersive web experiences for fashion & art brands.

Works.title: Selected Works
Works.subtitle: Curated selection of digital experiences crafted with precision and obsessive attention to detail.

01.title: Lumina Fashion
01.description: A fully immersive 3D fashion show experience that allows users to interact with garments in real-time. Built for high-performance and visual fidelity.

02.title: Apex Architecture
02.description: A structural and grid-based design system that reflects the precision of architecture. Focus on large typography and negative space.

03.title: Echo Sound
03.description: An experimental audio-visual platform where sound generates real-time WebGL graphics. A bridge between music and technology.

Deliverables.title: What We Deliver
Deliverables.subtitle: Digital craftsmanship defined by three core pillars.

01.title: Narrative Layouts
01.description: We don't just build pages; we structure linear stories. Every scroll is a chapter, guiding the user through your brand's journey.

02.title: Motion with Restraint
02.description: Animation should feel invisible. We use micro-interactions and physics-based motion that whisper luxury, never shouting for attention.

03.title: Performance First
03.description: Luxury means never waiting. We engineer for Core Web Vitals, aiming for LCP under 2.5s and a perfect Lighthouse score.

Process.title: The Method
Process.subtitle: From abstract thought to pixel-perfect reality.

01.title: Discovery & Strategy
01.desc: We begin by decoding your brand's DNA. No code is written until the core philosophy is understood.

02.title: Art Direction
02.desc: Defining the visual language. Moodboards, typography selection, and motion prototypes to set the tone.

03.title: Development
03.desc: Where the magic happens. Clean, semantic code using Next.js and WebGL to bring the vision to life.

04.title: Refinement & Launch
04.desc: Obsessive polishing. Performance tuning, accessibility checks, and the final deployment.
